name: Malum Ludum
description:
MALUM LUDUM

WASD To move. SPACE to jump

Made during a 48 hour game jam.

  • Theme: Gone
  • Modifier: Must be a speed-run, PVP, or local coop game. 

Credits: 

  • Nathan Frazier: Programmer, Audio, Level Design
  • Adam Weber: Programmer, UI, Level Design
  • Alek Belmas: Artist
